detectors.description:
HalvingGovernance.getRewardPerToken(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/HalvingGovernance.sol#642-658) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-durationStakedFractioned = durationStaked.mul(1e18).div(31536000) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/HalvingGovernance.sol#645)
	-getUserDetails[account].rewardPerToken.add(getCurrentAPR().mul(1e16).mul(durationStakedFractioned).div(1e18)) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/HalvingGovernance.sol#651-657)

detectors.description:

	- unstake(getUserDetails[msg.sender].totalAmountStaked) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/HalvingGovernance.sol#711)
		- (success,returndata) = address(token).call(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/HalvingGovernance.sol#365)
		- halvToken.safeTransfer(msg.sender,tokenAmount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/HalvingGovernance.sol#682)
	- claimRewards() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/HalvingGovernance.sol#712)
		- (success,returndata) = address(token).call(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/HalvingGovernance.sol#365)
		- halvToken.safeTransfer(account,claimableReward) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/HalvingGovernance.sol#705)
		- halvToken.safeTransfer(owner,rewardFees) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/HalvingGovernance.sol#706)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- claimRewards() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/HalvingGovernance.sol#712)
		- getUserDetails[account].rewardPerToken = getRewardPerToken(account) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/HalvingGovernance.sol#599)
		- getUserDetails[account].earnedRewards = earned(account) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/HalvingGovernance.sol#600)
		- getUserDetails[account].earnedRewards = 0 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/HalvingGovernance.sol#701)
		- getUserDetails[account].lastUpdateTime = block.timestamp (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/HalvingGovernance.sol#601)

detectors.description:
HalvingGovernance.getCurrentAPR() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/HalvingGovernance.sol#630-640) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= firstYear (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/HalvingGovernance.sol#631)
	- (block.timestamp > firstYear) && (block.timestamp <= secondYear) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/HalvingGovernance.sol#634)
	- block.timestamp > secondYear (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/HalvingGovernance.sol#637)
detectors.markdown:
[HalvingGovernance.getCurrentAPR()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/HalvingGovernance.sol#L630-L640) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- [block.timestamp <= firstYear](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/HalvingGovernance.sol#L631)
	- [(block.timestamp > firstYear) && (block.timestamp <= secondYear)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/HalvingGovernance.sol#L634)
	- [block.timestamp > secondYear](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/HalvingGovernance.sol#L637)
